sections.title: Acceptance of Terms
sections.content: By accessing and using El7a2ny services, you accept and agree to be bound by the terms and provision of this agreement.

sections.title: Service Description
sections.content: El7a2ny provides a platform connecting vehicle owners with certified automotive service providers for maintenance, repair, and emergency services.

sections.title: User Responsibilities
sections.content: Users are responsible for providing accurate information, maintaining account security, and using services in accordance with applicable laws.

sections.title: Service Availability
sections.content: Services are subject to availability and may be limited by geographic location, time, and service provider capacity.

sections.title: Payment Terms
sections.content: Payment for services is due upon completion unless otherwise agreed. We accept various payment methods as indicated on our platform.

sections.title: Limitation of Liability
sections.content: El7a2ny's liability is limited to the amount paid for services. We are not liable for indirect, incidental, or consequential damages.

sections.title: Termination
sections.content: We reserve the right to terminate or suspend access to our services at our sole discretion, without notice, for any reason.

metadata.title: Terms of Service - El7a2ny
metadata.description: Read El7a2ny's terms of service to understand the rules and guidelines for using our automotive service platform.
